abstract: Brian T. Moynihan, the new chief executive of Bank of America, fielded a barrage of questions from analysts on Wednesday, all more curious about his plans going forward than about the bank’s fourth-quarter loss of $5.2 billion.
snippet: Brian T. Moynihan, the new chief executive of Bank of America, fielded a barrage of questions from analysts on Wednesday, all more curious about his plans going forward than about the bank’s fourth-quarter loss of $5.2 billion.
lead_paragraph: Brian T. Moynihan, the new chief executive of Bank of America, fielded a barrage of questions from analysts on Wednesday, all curious about his plans for the bank.

headline.main: Analysts Press New BofA Chief on His Plans
